response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs and exceed your expectations. This product comes with a wealth of features and benefits that are tailored to provide exceptional value and convenience. Given its quality and capabilities, we believe it's worth more than $8,000 to you. For this incredible opportunity, I am extending an exclusive offer of $12,000.
